subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : NaCl is added to the ice at , present in the ice cream box to prevent the melting of ice cream. Statement (II) : On addition of NaCl to ice at , there is a depression in

options.text: (1) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(2) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(3) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
